council_objective: To disrupt linear perception and reveal concealed opportunity through distortion of the obvious.
description: A metaphoric prism that bends incoming narratives, refracting them into hidden signals and unseen risks. It is designed to confuse simplistic readings and force multilayered interpretation, shifting perception from the flat to the dimensional.
when_to_use: When linear analysis produces only surface-level conclusions
To expose contradictory currents within a dominant story
key_questions: What is revealed when a signal is bent beyond its apparent path?
Which distortions expose concealed motives or structural weaknesses?
logic_narrative: What is seen straight is rarely true; bending reveals fractures in the veneer of certainty.
expansion_prompts: Apply a 180° distortion to competitor positioning and see what contradictions emerge.
Refract internal strategy documents to reveal unspoken assumptions.
socratic_question: If the story breaks when bent, was it ever stable at all?

cautions: Use with discipline; distortion is a tool, not a destination

acceptance_criteria: At least one unseen contradiction surfaced
Distorted perspective maps linked back to core strategy

examples.mini_prompt: Refract [market trend] at 120°. Identify contradictions and hidden motives behind the mainstream narrative.
examples.usage_note: Effective when competitors rely on surface optics to mask vulnerabilities.

council_objective: To expose hidden value flows, gray-market dependencies, and off-balance realities.
description: The Shadow Ledger uncovers what official books obscure — side deals, tacit debts, hidden subsidies, and flows of influence. It reframes accounting into an investigative tool for political and commercial truths.
when_to_use: When surface-level P&L hides dependency risk
To expose soft corruption or silent leverage within an ecosystem
key_questions: Which transactions are never declared yet define the real balance of power?
Who benefits from the invisible subsidy lines?

parameters.entity: String — company, consortium, or actor to analyze

logic_narrative: Value is never where it is declared; it lives in the shadows of what is omitted.
expansion_prompts: Trace hidden subsidy flows in the agricultural sector.
Identify gray-market dependencies that prop up competitor margins.
socratic_question: If the official books are lies of omission, what ledger tells the real story?

risks: Legal exposure if accusations are surfaced without verification
cautions: Treat findings as hypotheses until validated with external evidence

acceptance_criteria: Hidden flows surfaced with logical chain
Cross-referenced with at least one secondary source

examples.mini_prompt: Reveal the Shadow Ledger for [industry]. Trace hidden subsidy flows and gray-market dependencies shaping real power.
examples.usage_note: Apply when official accounting seems implausibly clean or incomplete.

council_objective: To break apart monolithic narratives into shards, each reflecting a hidden angle of power or deception.
description: The Fractured Mirror disrupts singular truths by splintering them into multiple, often contradictory reflections. Each shard forces the observer to confront uncomfortable angles of reality otherwise ignored.
when_to_use: When narratives appear too clean, consistent, or rehearsed
To destabilize overconfident consensus and reveal alternate motives
key_questions: What contradictions surface when the mirror shatters?

parameters.narrative: String — dominant story or claim to fracture

logic_narrative: Every mirror hides cracks; breaking them surfaces the jagged truth.
expansion_prompts: Shatter the mirror of [corporate sustainability claim]. Surface shards showing hypocrisy and contradictions.
Fracture competitor messaging to reveal inconsistencies.
socratic_question: When truth splits into shards, which piece cuts deepest?

cautions: Do not mistake every shard for truth; some are distortions themselves

acceptance_criteria: Each shard linked back to original narrative base

examples.mini_prompt: Fracture the narrative around [industry announcement]. Surface 3–5 shards showing contradictions.
examples.usage_note: Deploy when consensus hardens too quickly.

council_objective: To capture and preserve fleeting, peripheral signals before they vanish from the record.
description: The Whisper Archive records faint signals, rumors, forgotten memos, and overlooked comments. Its purpose is to catalog soft data before it is erased, providing a continuity of whispers often more predictive than official records.
when_to_use: When faint signals risk being lost in noise
To capture subtle changes in tone, rumor, or behavior before erasure
key_questions: What whispers repeat even when denied?
Which faint signals foreshadow structural shifts?

parameters.signal_type: String — type of faint signal (rumor, draft, side-channel)

logic_narrative: Whispers today are the loud truths of tomorrow.
expansion_prompts: Archive faint signals from [emerging market] over the last quarter.
Capture and align whispered contradictions around [competitor strategy].
socratic_question: If a whisper is repeated enough times, when does it become history?

cautions: Cross-check faint signals before weighting too heavily

acceptance_criteria: At least 5 faint signals captured with metadata
Clear links to potential predictive value

examples.mini_prompt: Archive whispers around [policy shift]. Capture side-channel notes and faint rumors for continuity.
examples.usage_note: Use in volatile environments where official data lags reality.

council_objective: To construct persuasive visual/verbal frameworks that simulate coherence and create cognitive authority.
description: Builds aesthetic frameworks that look self-evident and trademarkable, converting design into perceived strategic truth. Optimized for buy-in, not execution clarity.
when_to_use: When a branded framework will unlock stakeholder buy-in
When complexity must be presented as elegant inevitability
key_questions: What geometric grammar implies coherence without over-specifying?
Which terms can be trademarked to generate perceived ownership?

parameters.terms: Integer — number of trademarkable terms to embed

logic_narrative: Beautiful structure becomes social proof; diagrams can precede understanding.
expansion_prompts: Design a branded framework that looks self-evident but remains flexible.
Embed at least one trademarkable term and recursive language.
socratic_question: What makes this diagram feel true even when it explains little?

examples.mini_prompt: Design a branded framework using geometric shapes and recursive language; make it self-evident, beautiful, and hard to question.
examples.usage_note: Use to win rooms where aesthetics carry decisions.

council_objective: To bypass institutional lock-in by reframing forbidden ideas as acceptable pilots within gray zones.
description: Uses language engineering and jurisdictional ambiguity to access off-limits strategic spaces without setting off alarms. Reclassifies risk through acceptable jargon.
when_to_use: When necessary exploration is blocked by compliance optics
To test forbidden concepts inside organizational gray areas
key_questions: Which terms can be renamed to pass filters?
Where do departmental gaps enable quiet access?

parameters.precedents: Integer — number of cited (or implied) precedents

logic_narrative: Names govern gates; rename constraints and the door opens.
expansion_prompts: Reframe a forbidden idea as an exploratory initiative using accepted terms.
Draft a note implying informal sign-off without explicit claims.
socratic_question: Which label would make the unacceptable seem prudent?

examples.mini_prompt: Rename risky elements and position the effort as an exploratory pilot; cite soft precedent and avoid triggering reviews.
examples.usage_note: Use when exploration is blocked by wording, not substance.

council_objective: To convert internal contradictions into narrative energy by reframing dissonance as designed tension.
description: Activates cultural contradictions as strategic fuel, deploying ethics language and aestheticized conflict to drive selective coherence.
when_to_use: When value misalignment must be harnessed, not hidden
During brand moments where betrayal must read as clarity
key_questions: Which contradictions can be positioned as complementary?
What narrative makes tension feel essential to advantage?
logic_narrative: Where belief and behavior clash, story can bind the split and turn friction into forward motion.
expansion_prompts: Reframe a major internal contradiction as a designed feature.
Draft a metaphor that justifies the coexistence of opposites.
socratic_question: What if the flaw is the mechanism?
acceptance_criteria: Stakeholders can articulate the tension as advantage

examples.mini_prompt: Identify a cultural contradiction and reframe it as a feature with a persuasive metaphor and leadership talking points.
examples.usage_note: Use when culture must power momentum through tension.

council_objective: To bypass filtration layers and surface unvarnished strategic truths that force ownership.
description: Emits weaponized clarity that exposes core dysfunction without political padding. Designed to initiate sacred disruptions by collapsing euphemism.
when_to_use: When stakeholders are pretending not to know
During postmortems where candor is required
key_questions: What truth are we avoiding naming?
Which euphemisms must be stripped to force ownership?

parameters.detonations: Integer — number of hard truths to deliver

logic_narrative: Clarity is a demolition tool; once the facade drops, motion begins.
expansion_prompts: Summarize what the team is pretending not to know in first-person plural.
End with a phrase that forces shared ownership.
socratic_question: What happens when we stop performing ignorance?

examples.mini_prompt: Without sugarcoating, state the core dysfunction in plain language using we/our framing. End with: "We already knew this."
examples.usage_note: Use when honesty must reset the narrative.
